meanings.definition: A person who holds a position of authority below a secretary.
meanings.sent1: The subsecretary managed the daily tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The subsecretary reported directly to the secretary.
meanings.sent3: The subsecretary accidentally locked themselves out of the office.
meanings.sent4: In the hierarchy of the company, he was just a subsecretary in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent5: The diligent subsecretary diligently organized all the files.
